TheOrbitt, I found out the solution. Add this to the DLL.XML


 ViMaCoreX
 False
 Vistamare\ViMaCoreX.dll


Now we have cars on the runway =)
rofl, tpb's parses part of the text. Just add the Vistamare\ViMaCoreX.dll to the dll.xml, copy paste other entries that may reside there and just replace the name and the path :)

Thanks guys! That indeed worked, now i got car traffic. For those who wonder what it has to be exactly:


    ViMaCoreX
    False
    Vistamare\ViMaCoreX.dll

Oh lol, i see TPB doesn't allow that. :')

Well, just use the one above it in your dll.xml and edit it.
